Sentencas: Recently, ceria-based nanocomposites have been considered as promising electrolyte candidates for low-temperature solid oxide fuel cells (LTSOFC) due to their dual-ion conduction and excellent performance.
Titulo: Enhanced conductivity of SDC based nanocomposite electrolyte by spark plasma sintering

Sentencas: However, the densification of these composites remains a great concern since the relative low density of the composite electrolyte is suspected to deteriorate the durability of fuel cell.
Titulo: Enhanced conductivity of SDC based nanocomposite electrolyte by spark plasma sintering

Sentencas: In the present study, the ionic conductivity of two kinds of SDC-based nanocomposite electrolytes processed by spark plasma sintering (SPS) method was investigated, and compared to that made by conventional cold pressing followed by sintering (normal processing way).
Titulo: Enhanced conductivity of SDC based nanocomposite electrolyte by spark plasma sintering

Sentencas: The density of solid electrolyte can reach higher than 95% of the theoretical value after SPS processing, while the relative density of the electrolyte pellets by normal processing way can hardly approach 75%.
Titulo: Enhanced conductivity of SDC based nanocomposite electrolyte by spark plasma sintering

Sentencas: The structure and morphology of the sintered pellets were characterized by XRD and SEM.
Titulo: Enhanced conductivity of SDC based nanocomposite electrolyte by spark plasma sintering

Sentencas: The ionic conductivity of samples was measured by electrochemical impedance spectroscopy (EIS).
Titulo: Enhanced conductivity of SDC based nanocomposite electrolyte by spark plasma sintering

Sentencas: The results showed that the ionic conductivity of the two kinds of electrolytes treated with SPS was significantly enhanced, compared with the electrolyte pellets processed through the conventional method.
Titulo: Enhanced conductivity of SDC based nanocomposite electrolyte by spark plasma sintering

Sentencas: The profile of impedance curve of the electrolytes was altered as well.
Titulo: Enhanced conductivity of SDC based nanocomposite electrolyte by spark plasma sintering

Sentencas: This study demonstrates that the conductivity of SDC based nanocomposite electrolyte can be further improved by adequate densification process.
Titulo: Enhanced conductivity of SDC based nanocomposite electrolyte by spark plasma sintering
